page.title: 04 - EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
There are five main areas of employment :-
FARM,GARAGE,SCHOOL,"CARE",SANDPITS
Most local inhabitants work outside the area. The remainder work on farms for local small businesses, such as garages, shops and other service industries and for community related services such as St. Michael's School. The Sandpits at Heathend and Coates are the only employment geared up towards producing something ( apart from farming ); the sand is used for building purposes.
A family-run garage at Heathend with an agency for east european cars employs about six people to repair cars, serve petrol on the forecourt etc. (continued)
